summary: Syntax highlight file for Intel IA64 Itanium processor
name: ia64.vim
description: This version (0.7) of ia64.vim scripts fixes the highlighting problem with (tbit.z.*) instructions as pointed out by a user. Version (0.6) which comes with vim 6.1 does not highlight these instructions correctly.
install_details: Copy the file ia64.vim into your <vim install directory>\vim61\syntax folder
